exec.Name: Jason Xian
exec.Bio: Jason started competing in Science Olympiad when he was in the seventh grade, then continued as captain of his high school team. During a high school summer program at Penn, Jason researched CRISPR before it became widely studied, due to his interests from Protein Modeling. Now, Jason is a student in the Jerome Fisher Program in Management & Technology. He hopes everyone enjoys the fourth annual Penn Science Olympiad Invitational and the Urban Initiative!

exec.Name: Eric Liu
exec.High School: West Windsor Plainsboro High School South
exec.Favorite SOUP: Anything with the word "cream" in it
exec.Bio: Eric is a junior in M&T studying Computer Science and Business Economics. Eric does not like writing bios.

exec.Name: Mimi Lu
exec.Position: VP of Operations, VP of Communications
exec.Bio: Mimi is a junior from Syracuse, New York studying Cognitive Science and Philosophy. In addition to SOUP, she is involved in clubs like Penn Neuroscience Society and Penn Undergraduate Law Journal. In her free time, Mimi enjoys reading, finding new brunch spots, and taking care of cute little plants. ​

exec.Name: Carol Li
exec.Bio: Carol is from the foreign lands of Vancouver, Canada, and is still trying to adjust to the moody climate of the east coast. When she isn't missing the west coast, you can find her exploring the nooks and crannies of Philly, trying out different restaurants, or sitting in the F floor of Huntsman scrambling to finish a problem set before the deadline.

exec.Name: Zihan Xiong
exec.Studies: Finance, Business Economics & Public Policy, Political Science
exec.Bio: Zihan is a senior in Wharton and the College. She is always looking for a cup of caffeine and good music to jam out to. Recently, she has been aspiring to create new bubble tea concoctions.

exec.Name: Violet Tu
exec.Bio: Violet is a junior at the University of Pennsylvania majoring in biophysics and minoring in Netflix studies. In her free time, she says you can find her working out at the campus gym or studying hard in the library; but in actuality you can typically find her waiting in line at her favorite food truck or sleeping till noon in her room. Violet has been a part of SOUP for all three years, and she can’t wait to meet all the new schools coming to our competition this year.

exec.Name: Jonathan Lee
exec.Bio: Jonathan is a senior studying biochemistry with plans to attend medical school after graduation. When he's not studying for his classes or working on SOUP, he can likely be found in his clinical research lab where he examines non-invasive methods of assessing cardiovascular structure and function using MRI and echocardiograms. For leisure, he enjoys swimming and watching basketball and Netflix, where his favorite shows are Stranger Things, Parks and Recreation, and The Office (in no particular order).

exec.Name: Emily Augustine
exec.Position: Earth and Space Science Director, Event Supervisor for Geologic Mapping
exec.Bio: Emily is a senior and has been involved with SOUP all 4 years of college. While at Penn, she has also enjoyed doing research in the lab and volunteering with Penn for Youth Debate. She’s excited to learn about the topics of this year’s earth and space events and is looking forward to another great tournament!

exec.Name: Kirti Nath
exec.Position: Biology Director; Event Supervisor for Designer Genes
exec.Bio: Kirti is a junior in the Life Sciences and Management Program at Penn. In both middle and high school, Science Olympiad was one of Kirti's favorite extracurriculars. She competed in almost all of the biology events throughout the years and her favorite event back in the day was entomology. This is Kirti's third year working on SOUP and she is excited for another great tournament. Feel free to reach out to her with any biology event related questions!

exec.Name: Kevin Chen
exec.Position: Nature of Science Director, Event Supervisor for Circuit Lab
exec.Bio: In addition to SOUP, Kevin designs printed circuit boards for electric racecars as part of Penn Electric Racing. He is a huge fan of the Marvel Cinematic Universe (I love you 3000) and recently binged Brooklyn Nine-Nine.

exec.Name: Selene Li
exec.Bio: Selene is currently a sophomore in the College on the pre-med track. She enjoy cooking and trying to not burn down the kitchen when experimenting with new recipes. It’s sometimes hard getting in contact with Selene since she has become a serial napper in recent months.

exec.Name: Nick Plante
exec.Bio: Science Olympiad has given a lot to Nick over the years. From dear friends to unforgettable experiences and valuable knowledge, the list of what SciOly has to offer never seems to end. Nick is quite grateful to give back to the mission that has meant so much to him and others close to him.

exec.Name: Eric Wang
exec.High School: Thomas Jefferson High School for Science and Technology
exec.Bio: Eric is a junior in Engineering studying computer science.

exec.Name: Gaurav Gupta
exec.Position: Urban Initiative Coordinator, Event Supervisor for Machines
exec.Bio: Gaurav is a sophomore in the College. He has been doing Science Olympiad since my freshman year of high school, and has been volunteering for even longer. He loves helping others out, and is excited to have a larger role in the Urban Initiative this year!

exec.Name: Anushree Aneja
exec.Position: Urban Initiative Coordinator, Event Supervisor for Disease Detectives
exec.Bio: Anushree loves exploring new places to eat in Center and University City. (Hit her up for recommendations!) She has watched all 15 seasons of Grey's Anatomy, and still plan on watching, so feel free to join her on Thursdays. She has done Science Olympiad since she was in 5th grade, and she is so excited to be able to continue in college!

team.Name: Jessica Hao
team.Studies: Biology in the 7 year bio-dental program.
team.Bio: Jessica is a freshman from the Philly suburbs majoring in biology in the 7 year bio-dental program and minoring in visual arts. She can be found running along the Schuylkill, shopping at the mall, cranking out homework in Van Pelt, trying out new restaurants, or binging SNL. This is Jessica's first year as a part of SOUP, and she cannot wait for this year's tournament.

team.Name: Yonny Sklansky
team.Bio: Yonny is a freshman at Penn studying physics, who loves astronomy. Prior to being a part of SOUP, Yonny was a Science Olympiad competitor for six years. In high school, Yonny competed for Bayard Rustin HS and went to the Penn Invitational every year since it started.

team.Name: Jio Jeong
team.Favorite SOUP: Clam chowder and chicken noodle soup
team.Bio: Jio is a freshman in the College planning to major in chemistry. Born and raised in Seoul, Korea, she has a love-hate relationship with K-pop. Her favorite foods on campus are SoBol and the t.b.a. sandwich from Franklin's Table. She is excited and grateful to be a part of SOUP this year.

team.Name: Richard Duan
team.Bio: Richard is a junior studying biochemistry at the University of Pennsylvania as a Vagelos Molecular Life Sciences scholar, hoping to graduate with an additional masters in chemistry. He likes teaching and mentoring, is involved with a few such groups on campus, and is an active peer advisor although he doesn't even have his next semester planned out. He's been involved with SciOly test writing since freshman year.

team.Name: Adi Bhati
team.Bio: Adi is a freshman at the University of Pennsylvania majoring in Computer Science. In his limited free time, you can find him losing to his friends in Super Smash, 'playing' soccer and basketball, thinking about going to the gym, and wishing that he brought his PS4 to college. Being from Minnesota, he is very excited to see all the amazing schools that come to SOUP, and he hopes to help provide a fun and enriching experience.

team.Name: John Lee
team.Bio: John is a junior majoring in biological mathematics. In his free time, he enjoys reading, writing, and finding new music to listen to while relaxing. He is excited to be a part of SOUP this year to build a fantastic SciOly experience!

team.Name: Richard Chai
team.Bio: Richard is a freshman studying biology. When not attentively grinding out trophies in brawl stars, he can be found listening to thought-provoking Korean pop.

team.Name: Clarisa Yee
team.Bio: Clarisa is a freshman at the University of Pennsylvania studying in the School of Nursing. When she is not studying, she is usually watching her latest episode of a K-drama in her room or at the gym while working out to de-stress. She loves food and thrives off of snacks, bubble tea, and dessert - which can be quite unhealthy sometimes. Clarisa has been involved with Science Olympiad in high school, and she is excited to continue her involvement through the SOUP community!

team.Name: Gloria Lee
team.Bio: Gloria is a freshman at the University of Pennsylvania studying physics and bioengineering. In her free time, she enjoys figure skating, playing soccer, and photography. This is her first year in SOUP, but she competed in Science Olympiad for three years in high school and is very excited to be a part of SOUP this year.

team.Name: Rohil Sheth
team.Position: Finance Committee Member, Detector Building Event Supervisor
team.Bio: Rohil is a freshman at the University of Pennsylvania majoring in Mechanical Engineering with possible minors in Computer Science and Engineering Entrepreneurship. In his free time, he can be seen at a poker game with his hall or running to Wawa to grab some mac and cheese. He's been part of SciOly since middle school and can't wait to meet all the teams coming to SOUP this year!

team.Name: Yi-An Hsieh
team.Position: Finance Committee Member, Protein Modeling Event Supervisor
team.High School: Orange County School of the Arts, Visual Arts Conservatory
team.Bio: Yi-An is a freshman in Bioengineering. She is passionate about metal arts and costuming, and she loves cats, hiking, and reading mystery thrillers. In her free time, she can be found trying to revive her ailing houseplants.

team.Name: Charis Ma
team.Bio: Charis is a freshman in the College who has no idea what she's majoring in yet, but will probably say biology or BBB if asked. When she isn't studying in the Van Pelt Reading Room, you can find her frantically avoiding the scary squirrels on campus or painting and knitting in her room. Charis has competed at SOUP as a high school student for the past two years and is super excited to help host the event this year!

team.Name: Jessica Ling
team.Bio: Jessica is a freshman studying bioengineering at the University of Pennsylvania. She enjoys sculpting, reading, and playing the violin in her free time, and is also involved in robotics.

team.Name: Owen Simon
team.Bio: Owen is a sophomore from Lincolnshire, IL studying Computer Science. He enjoys hanging out with friends and is always down for a game of Smash. Outside of SOUP, Owen is also a member of the Penn Aerial Robotics team and the Penn Social Deduction Club.

team.Name: Maggie Zhou
team.Position: Operations Committee Member, Water Quality Event Supervisor
team.Bio: Maggie is a freshman studying neuroscience and computer science. Maggie loves Science Olympiad since her first year of high school. She is also a huge cat lover and has three cats!

team.Name: Sarah Tadlock
team.Bio: Sarah is a freshman studying Mechanical Engineering and Applied Mechanics. She loves books, stickers, and boba. She competed in SciOly Divisions A-C, and is excited to continue her involvement in a new role. She can't wait to see everyone in February!

team.Name: Peter Ma
team.Bio: Peter is a junior at Penn studying biochemistry. He was part of his high school Science Olympiad team, competed in SOUP's first invitational, and has now been part of SOUP in college. His favorite events are astronomy, air trajectory, and hovercraft!

team.Name: Grant Li
team.Bio: Grant is a freshman at the University of Pennsylvania majoring in Computational Biology. In his free time, he can be found sleeping through all his alarms or yelling at his game of Tetris. This is the first year Grant is participating in SOUP and he can't wait to see what it brings!

team.Name: Brandon Chyi
team.Bio: Brandon is a freshman at Penn and plans on majoring in chemistry and physics in the Vagelos MLS program. Brandon likes to spend most of his time asleep, regardless of whether he's busy or not. He also loves meeting new people, so please stop by and say hi!

team.Name: Savan Patel
team.Bio: Savan is a freshmen at the University of Pennsylvania majoring in bioengineering and economics. In his free time, he enjoys watching The Office on repeat (7th time through) or playing tennis with friends. This is Savan's first year in SOUP and he has competed for all 4 years in high school. He is super excited about memes.

team.Name: Chuqi Zheng
team.Bio: Chuqi is a freshman at the University of Pennsylvania planning on majoring in biochemistry, chemistry, and maybe neurobiology, and minoring in creative writing. She can often be found decorating her room for holidays, baking, or studying in Van Pelt. She hopes that she can be found at the campus gym more often, but that may or may not happen. This is Chuqi’s first year in SOUP, and she’s very excited for the upcoming year and her first SOUP invitational.

team.Name: Pallavi Jonnalagadda
team.Bio: Pallavi is a freshman at the University of Pennsylvania majoring in Bioengineering and Classics. When she's not in class, she can be found hanging out with friends on campus, thinking about frozen custard, and/or singing along to the latest Billy Joel song that's stuck in her head. Previously a competitor in Science Olympiad for seven years, Pallavi loves the Science Olympiad community and is excited to be a proud member of SOUP!

team.Name: Conner Pettit
team.High School: Regis Jesuit High School in Aurora, Colorado
team.Bio: Conner is a freshman at the University of Pennsylvania, likely majoring in biology and materials engineering through the dual degree VIPER program. In his free time, he enjoys watching youtube videos, including ones documenting the cute habit of baby orangutans embracing each other at various "Jungle" schools scattered around Borneo. On campus, he can be foudn either speed walking to classes or inhaling his food before speed walking to classes. He is excited to get people interested about the various water quality issues currently facing the planet.

team.Name: Alan Ismaiel
team.Bio: Alan is a sophomore majoring in computer science. Outside of SOUP, he can be found in the Penn Band as a bari saxophone player, or somewhere trying (and failing) to convince people to watch Bachelor in Paradise with him. He participated in his high school Science Olympiad team since it was founded his sophomore year, and is excited to continue giving back to this experience that meant so much to him.

team.Name: Tosin Odufalu
team.Position: Write It Do It Event Supervisor
team.Bio: Tosin is a sophomore on the pre-med track planning to major in either chemistry or biochemistry. After doing SciOly all throughout high school, she was excited to be able to continue in college! Outside of SOUP, Tosin sings in The Inspiration A Cappella and helps to teach chemistry to high school students in West Philadelphia. She is excited for her second year of SOUP and can't wait for a great year!

team.Name: Grace Jiang
team.Position: Write It, Do It Event Supervisor

team.Name: Ryan Lee
team.Position: Operations Committee Member, Dynamic Planet Event Supervisor

team.Name: Tahmid Ahamed
team.Position: Finance Committee Member, Detector Building Event Supervisor
